law.catch_line: Notice of affiliation with Kentucky cooperating broker required.

text.section: A notice of affiliation shall be true and complete and shall be signed or otherwise authenticated under penalty of perjury by both the out-of-state principal broker and out-of-state licensee.
An out-of-state principal broker and out-of-state licensee may enter into cooperation agreements and notices of affiliation with respect to more than one (1) Kentucky cooperating broker.

law.history: Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 156, sec. 3, effective July 15, 2008.
